jcurses.widgets
类 WidgetContainer

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.Widget
      jcurses.widgets.WidgetContainer
直接已知子类：
Panel
public abstract class WidgetContainer
extends Widget

This class is a superclass for widget containers, that is, for widgets, that can contain other widgets

构造方法摘要
WidgetContainer()
           
 
方法摘要
protected  void addWidget(Widget widget, LayoutConstraint constraint)
          The method adds a widget to the container, declaring widget's lyouting constraints.
protected  void doPaint()
          This method paints the widget.
protected  void doRepaint()
          This method repaints the widget.
protected  Rectangle getChildsRectangle()
          This method returns the rectangle, that is used as painting surface for container's children If null is returned, the entire container's surface is used.
 LayoutManager getLayoutManager()
           
protected  java.util.Vector<Widget> getListOfFocusables()
          The method returns a list of input widgets within the container.
protected  java.util.Vector<Widget> getListOfWidgetsWithShortCuts()
          The method returns a list of widgets, that can handle shortcuts, within the container.
protected  void pack()
          The method layouts all children of the widget, using containers layout manager.
protected abstract  void paintSelf()
          The method paits the container self, that is all except childrens.
protected  void removeWidget(Widget widget)
          The method removes a widget from the container.
protected abstract  void repaintSelf()
          The method repaints the container self, that is all, except childrens.
 void setLayoutManager(LayoutManager layoutManager)
          The method sets container's layout manager
 
从类 jcurses.widgets.Widget 继承的方法
focus, getAbsoluteX, getAbsoluteY, getColors, getDefaultColors, getFocus, getParent, getPreferredSize, getRectangle, getShortCutsList, getSize, getVisible, getWindow, getX, getY, handleInput, hasFocus, isFocusable, isVisible, paint, repaint, setColors, setParent, setSize, setVisible, setWindow, setX, setY, unfocus

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

WidgetContainer

public WidgetContainer()
方法详细信息

paintSelf

protected abstract void paintSelf()
The method paits the container self, that is all except childrens. Is called by doPaint. Must be overrided by derived classes.

doPaint

protected void doPaint()
从类 Widget 复制的描述
This method paints the widget. Will be called by paint(), only if the widget is visible. Must be implemented be derived classes.

指定者：
类 Widget 中的 doPaint

repaintSelf

protected abstract void repaintSelf()
The method repaints the container self, that is all, except childrens. Is called by doRepaint. Must be overrided by derived classes.

doRepaint

protected void doRepaint()
从类 Widget 复制的描述
This method repaints the widget. Will be called by paint(), only if the widget is visible. Must be implemented be derived classes.

指定者：
类 Widget 中的 doRepaint

pack

protected void pack()
The method layouts all children of the widget, using containers layout manager. The method is called by framework, before it paints a window-

addWidget

protected void addWidget(Widget widget,
                         LayoutConstraint constraint)
The method adds a widget to the container, declaring widget's lyouting constraints. This method is called by layout manager and cann't be called by developer. To add a widget to the container, a developer must use methods of container's layout manager.

参数：
widget - widget to add

removeWidget

protected void removeWidget(Widget widget)
The method removes a widget from the container. This method is called by layout manager and cann't be called by developer. To remove a widget from the container, a developer must use methods of container's layout manager.

参数：
widget - widget to remove

getListOfFocusables

protected java.util.Vector<Widget> getListOfFocusables()
The method returns a list of input widgets within the container.

返回：
input widgets within container

getListOfWidgetsWithShortCuts

protected java.util.Vector<Widget> getListOfWidgetsWithShortCuts()
The method returns a list of widgets, that can handle shortcuts, within the container.

返回：
widgets within container, that can handle shortcuts

getChildsRectangle

protected Rectangle getChildsRectangle()
This method returns the rectangle, that is used as painting surface for container's children If null is returned, the entire container's surface is used.

setLayoutManager

public void setLayoutManager(LayoutManager layoutManager)
The method sets container's layout manager

参数：
layoutManager - new layout manager

getLayoutManager

public LayoutManager getLayoutManager()
返回：
container's layout manager
